content.comments: Excellent work on Phase 1. 9/9 tasks completed with 277+ tests passing and 100% validation success rate. Phase 2 plan is well-structured with clear dependencies. Proceed with implementation.
instructions: Begin populating PROACTIVE-JOBS.md with Phase 2 tasks
Start with p2-1-a (create test task following new template)
Follow existing max 2 concurrent worker rule
Ensure 3-layer validation continues for all tasks
